title: Artikay Kofta
desc: A healthy twist on kofta with no onions or potatoes
steps: Mix in ginger, chillies, flour, spices & coriander; form balls.
Fry in an Appe pan or air-fry at 375°F for 7 minutes.
Blend tomato, ginger, chillies & nuts; sauté spices, add paste & water; simmer.
Cook kofta in gravy 2–3 min, garnish & serve.

title: Simplest Coconut Kurma
desc: Velvety, no-onion-no-garlic curry ready in 20 min
steps: Add veg + water + salt; cook 3 whistles; mash lightly.
Simmer off excess water; stir in coconut milk.
Add peas & spices; cook 2–3 min; garnish & serve.
